title: DUNES OF SAND
lyrics:
As far as the eye can see
The wastelands I call my home
Returning for the thrill
Where my silence is silver
My noise is gold

The lightest dunes of sand

Are mountains, I let them grow

Standing on my two hands

Under your control



I saw it, it was real

A place for us to start a home

I'm going in for the kill

My silence is silver

So I've been told



The lightest dunes of sand

Are mountains, I let them grow

Standing on my two hands

Under your control



The lightest dunes of sand

Won't let me raise my voice

Stranded on dried up land

Flooded and overgrown



My silence is silver

My noise is gold



The lightest dunes of sand

Are mountains, I let them grow

Standing on my two hands

Under your control



The lightest dunes of sand

Won't let me raise my voice

Stranded on dried up land

Flooded and overgrown



Ooh, ooh

Ooh, ooh

Ooh, ooh

Ooh, ooh
